item.title: Outside Sycamore Court main gate, 6th July
item.description:
This drain overflowed with very smelly toilet water/paper during rain today. I've called Camden out for this twice in the past and it's not enough just to rinse out drain. There is a bigger issue that needs investigating please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bransdale Close, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Between 20 Bransdale Close and the Sycamore Court entrance - on the footpath towards Mutrix Road, 6th July
item.description:
Same issue as Please reference 7675638. This is the sewer in between 20 Bransdale Close and the Sycamore Court entrance, on the footpath towards Mutrix Road. The whole street was flooded and covered in sewage. This reference issue was closed - but it rained again today 6 July and it flooded again. In the drain, the water level is right at the top. There must be a blockage further down the sewer. There is also water backed up all the way to sewer near 15/16 Bransdale Close. This is half full. So please could this be looked at as well?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Mutrix Road, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet
